response.name: get questions
response.body:
[
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "1",
        "text": "Define the term \"metaphor\".",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "1"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "1",
        "text": "Analyze the main theme in Shakespeare’s \"Macbeth\".",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "2"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "1",
        "text": "Write a short essay on the impact of literature in modern society.",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "3"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "1",
        "text": "Explain the difference between a simile and a metaphor.",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "4"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "1",
        "text": "Identify the subject and predicate in this sentence: \"The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.\"",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "5"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "2",
        "text": "Solve the equation 3x + 5 = 14.",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "6"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "2",
        "text": "Calculate the derivative of the function f(x) = x^2 + 3x.",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "7"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "2",
        "text": "If the probability of event A is 0.3, what is the probability of its complement?",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "8"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "2",
        "text": "Graph the function y = 2x - 4.",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "9"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "2",
        "text": "Find the area of a circle with radius 5 units.",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "10"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "3",
        "text": "Taja na ueleze sifa kuu za fasihi simulizi.",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "11"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "3",
        "text": "Changanua maudhui ya riwaya ya \"Kusadikika\" na Shaaban Robert.",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "12"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "3",
        "text": "Eleza maana ya methali: \"Haraka haraka haina baraka.\"",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "13"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "3",
        "text": "Tunga sentensi kwa kutumia neno \"upendo\".",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "14"
    },
    {
        "date_created": "2024-02-01 06:26:22",
        "exam_schedule_id": "3",
        "text": "Taja na ueleze ngeli za Kiswahili.",
        "marks": "5",
        "question_id": "15"
